description.narrative: New Financial Controller has been recruited. Initiated National Gender Committee with the coordination of National Cooperative Council and Department of Cooperative Development. Formed a Gender Leading Team with the representatives of partners and We Effect to monitor gender based violence (GBV) in the working locations. Launched EU project "Inclusive and sustainable socio economic development of marginalized and war affected communities in North Central and Eastern Sri Lanka" in Eastern and North-Central provinces and signed MOU with Commissioner of Cooperative Departments in the respective two provinces. Conducted a training on case management and gender equality for partners and We Effect staff in order to develop their skills and knowledge. A communication plan has been developed in addition to the EU communication plan. Gender Action Plan has been developed for the EU funded project. Further a training program on cooperative concept, principles, values for all the partner project staff and National Program Meeting for 2018 was conducted with all the partner staff. Country office hired an outsourced consultant as financial consultant to support the financial reporting and management.
Provide partner organisations with technical assistance and administrative support in planning, implementation, monitoring and evaluation in We Effect cooperation projects in the country.

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
Planned start date of the activity
